document_data.name: Embro Cymrych II
document_data.mainbody: '''Embro Cymrych II''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the early-to-mid 7{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the son of his predecessor, High King [[Embro Cymrych I|Embro I]]. His successor was his first son, [[Alec Cymrych I|Alec]]. His second son, [[Samuel Cymrych|Samuel]], would also go on to become High King after the death of Alec and of [[Rowland Cymrych|Alec's son]].
